snippet.title: [Official Trailer Release] AFK Arena x Re:ZERO Crossover Official Trailer is released!
snippet.description:
On April 12th, The Demon Maid Rem and Spiritual Arts User Emilia officially arrive in the world of Esperia!
Presenting the AFK Arena x Re:ZERO Crossover Official Trailer!
